text: The Girl with the Red Hair () is a 1981 Dutch World War II drama movie directed by Ben Verbong and was based on the biography novel of Hannie Schaft. It stars Ren√©e Soutendijk, Peter Tuinman, Loes Luca, Johan Leysen, Robert Delhez, Ada Bouwman, Adrian Brine. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:1981 war movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ben Verbong
title: The Girl with the Red Hair
